OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : ( Surgery follow chemoradiotherapy ) : Patients undergo exploratory laparotomy follow radical hysterectomy bilateral pelvic para-aortic lymphadenectomy . Depending finding surgery , radical hysterectomy lymphadenectomy either complete aborted . - Aborted hysterectomy : Patients abort hysterectomy assign 1 3 group , depend finding surgery . - Group 1 : Within 4 week surgery , patient undergo pelvic radiotherapy 5 time weekly 4-6 week intracavitary irradiation external radiotherapy . Patients also receive concurrent cisplatin IV 1 hour weekly total 5-6 dos . - Group 2 : Patients receive radiotherapy cisplatin group 1 additional extend field radiotherapy . - Group 3 : Patients receive treatment discretion investigator . - Completed hysterectomy : Patients complete radical hysterectomy assign 1 3 group , depend finding surgery . - Group A : Patients receive treatment group 1 without intracavity irradiation . - Group B : Patients receive treatment group 2 without intracavity irradiation . - Group C : Patients receive treatment . - Arm II ( Primary chemoradiotherapy ) : Patients undergo pelvic radiotherapy 5 time weekly 4-6 week intracavity irradiation external radiotherapy . Patients also receive concurrent cisplatin IV 1 hour weekly total 6 dos . Quality life assess baseline , week 5 therapy , 3 , 6 , 12 month . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 740 patient ( 370 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 7.5 year .
